Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.cli

Class CLIHelper

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.cli.CLIHelper
public class CLIHelper
extends java.lang.Object
Contains all the unicode ANSI and special strings used throughout the CLI.
